creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: woman with hair in two braids, wearing an apron, and two children bathing in a stream running between rocks; mounted on board
dimension: 18 15/16 x 14 in. (48.1 x 35.56 cm) (image, sheet, mount)
inscription:
Inscription, Stamp and Label

on back, in black ink: [BATHING / THE (crossed out) / LA ESPERANZA / near SUCRE, BOLIVIA]
markings: on back, stamped in black: [TOM STACK & ASSOCIATES / 1638 FARWELL AVE.  APT 3B / CHICAGO, ILLINOIS 60626]; on back: photographer\'s address label
title: Bathing, La Esperanza, Near Sucre, Bolivia
